resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/108599</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>108599</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206435</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Tracking Down the Real Billy the Kid</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gleichlauf hinunter den realen Billy das Zicklein</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dépistant vrai Billy le gosse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Seguindo abaixo o billy real o miúdo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Rintracciando giù il billy reale il capretto</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ακολουθώντας κάτω από τον πραγματικό Billy το 
κατσίκι</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Siguiendo abajo del billy verdadero al cabrito</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">is a lesson in which students learn about the role of gunfighters in the settling of the West and analyze interviews with people who knew William H. Bonney, better known as Billy the Kid.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">ist eine Lektion, in der Kursteilnehmer über die 
Rolle der Revolverhelder im Vereinbaren des Westens erlernen und 
Interviews mit Leuten, die William H. Bonney kannten, verbessern als 
Billy das Zicklein bekannt analysieren.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">est une leçon dans laquelle les étudiants se 
renseignent sur le rôle des bandits dans l'arrangement de l'ouest et 
analysent des entrevues avec les personnes qui ont connu William H. 
Bonney, améliorent connu comme Billy le gosse.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">é uma lição em que os estudantes aprendem sobre
o papel dos gunfighters em se estabelecir do oeste e analisam 
entrevistas com povos que conheceram William H. Bonney, melhoram 
sabido como o billy o miúdo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">è una lezione in cui gli allievi imparano circa 
il ruolo dei gunfighters nella sedimentazione dell'ovest ed analizzano
le interviste con la gente che ha conosciuto William H. Bonney, 
migliorano conosciuto come billy il capretto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">είναι ένα μάθημα στο οποίο οι σπουδαστές μαθαίνουν 
για το ρόλο των gunfighters στην τακτοποίηση της δύσης και 
αναλύουν τις συνεντεύξεις με τους ανθρώπους που ήξεραν William 
Χ. Bonney, καλύτερα γνωστό ως Billy το κατσίκι.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">es una lección en la cual los estudiantes 
aprenden sobre el papel de gunfighters en colocar del oeste y analizan
entrevistas con la gente que conocía Guillermo H. Bonney, mejoran 
conocido como billy el cabrito.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206435</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>108599</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/tracking-down-the-real-billy-the-kid</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
